text: Oh nice, that does work, thanks <@U38EZFVFE>!
Following up here: we changed the way image resizing works, but are having some caching issues. Should be resolved within the next day or so!
I am indeed, thanks Plaid Chad
Mark, DM me what you're seeing and I can take a look.
just noticed the `|escape_jinjava` filter, pretty cool
we need a slack notification every time the filter and function pages get updated

quick question on the slack notification, how would you expect that to work? As in be sent to the <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates> channel? Also, what kind of updates? I am assuming you arent meaning everytime we update a misspelling or anything like that so would it be whenever we add new functions to the lists or things like that?

<@U6GNQ7JBU> I’ll look into that, is there a way to tailor notifications for what I am looking for?

<@U2H3TT8F2> :thinking_face: Maybe just when a new item is added, but not edited
noted, thanks John, ill look into this

In the mean-time, if you haven’t perused the docs much lately I’d advise poking around.

Many of the docs have been updated recently to improve clarity. Most of the updates are not related to new functionality but exposing existing functionality that may not have been obvious or clear in it’s documentation. If you have feedback on the CMS docs, AJ and I would both love to hear it.

Some notable new functionality though: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/new-feature-new-list-operations>

If you are interested in being kept up to date on any changes that affect developers, we recommend subscribing to the developer changelog and watching <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates>

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>
